H0.text: By what name are the Essex one-day cricket team known. Falcons

H2.text: By what name are the Essex one-day cricket team known. Sharks

H3.text: By what name are the Essex one-day cricket team known. Eagle

A4.text: The limited overs team has previously been known as the Essex Eagles but now play simply as Essex
